util

Class SimTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.SimTime

  • public class SimTime
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage simulated time. Initialize time with current local time when constructed. Log format: YYYY-DOY-HH:MM:ss.mmm
    Author:
    David McComas

      • Tick

        public boolean Tick()

      • Tick

        public boolean Tick(int ms)
        Increment the simulation time by one clock tick.
        Parameters:
        ms - the number of milliseconds to use for the time tick
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the start of a new 1 second period occurred as a reult of the tick

      • getLogString

        public java.lang.String getLogString()
        Return the current time using the format: YYYY-DOY-HH:MM:ss.mmm
        Returns:
        a string representing the current time

      • getTick

        public int getTick()
        Retrieve the current tick value.
        Returns:

      • isLeapYear

        public boolean isLeapYear(int year)
        Determine whether the supplied year is a leap year.
        Parameters:
        year - year to be evaluated
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether the current year is a leap year
